html:
Fatafeat, Discovery Inc.'s leading Arabic food network in the Middle East, proudly announces its integration as a skill on the recently launched Arabic version of Alexa, Amazon's intelligent virtual assistant.

Renowned for helping create meaningful memories in Arabic households through culinary arts, Fatafeat partnered with Amazon to make its content even more accessible and enjoyable. The Fatafeat skill in Alexa means fans can expect an effortless cooking experience as Alexa serves as their sous-chef, providing verbal instructions on how to cook their favorite Fatafeat recipes in fluent Arabic and its dialects.

Whether trying to find a new recipe to experiment with, or perfecting family favourites with a twist, the new Arabic Alexa will be the ideal kitchen companion through its Fatafeat skill.

Fatafeat fans can unlock Alexa’s Fatafeat skill through Amazon’s Echo devices, which are available on https://www.amazon.ae 

-Ends-

For media enquiries:
M&C Saatchi
Discovery@mcsaatchi.com 

About Fatafeat 

Fatafeat was launched in 2006 as the first Arabic channel in the Middle East specialized in culinary arts. It is part of Discovery Communications and a subsidiary of Takhayal Entertainment.  Broadcasting its programs to more than 55 million families in 21 Arabic-speaking countries across the Middle East and North Africa, Fatafeat offers the best in innovative and creative ideas in cooking delicious dishes from a talented team of local and international chefs to inspire and entertain the whole family.
